Alert.Location-of-eye: The center of Tropical Storm DODONG was estimated based on all available data at 305 km West of Sinait, Ilocos Sur (18.1 °N, 117.6 °E )
Alert.Strength: Maximum sustained winds of 65 km/h near the center and gustiness of up to 80 km/h
Alert.Forecast-Position: Jul 15, 2023 08:00 PM - 350 km West Northwest of Laoag City, Ilocos Norte (OUTSIDE PAR), Jul 16, 2023 08:00 AM - 555 km West of Calayan, Cagayan (OUTSIDE PAR), Jul 16, 2023 08:00 PM - 750 km West of Basco, Batanes (OUTSIDE PAR)
